Errors.defaultError: Sorry, we really do not known what could have gone wrong. If the problem persists please send an issue to helpdesk.
Errors.badRequest: Sorry, something went wrong while processing your request.
Errors.unauthorized: You are not authorized. If you think this is a mistake, please contact competent person or send issue to helpdesk.
Errors.forbidden: You are not authorized. If you think this is a mistake, please contact competent person or send issue to helpdesk.
Errors.notFound: Request is invalid. Please check provided URL.
Errors.internal: Internal error occured. Please try again and if the problem persists send an issue to helpdesk.
Errors.serviceUnavailable: Service is currently unavailable. Please try again later.
Errors.requestTimeout: Request timeout. Please try again later.
Errors.baseNetworkError: Network error - resource is not available or does not exist.
Errors.uulamp-level10-lamp-provider/no-base-uri: The Lamp URL property (baseUri) is not defined.
Errors.uulamp-level10-lamp-provider/no-code: The Identification Code property (code) is not defined.
Errors.uulamp-level10-lamp-provider/code-format: Identification Code property (code) can contain only alphanumeric characters and underscore. Must have at least 3 characters but not more than 32 characters.
Errors.uu-gateway-main/invalidRequest: Request is invalid. Please check provided URL.
Errors.uu-app-workspace/forbiddenAwidSysState: Application workspace is not in active state and is probably under maintenance. Please try again later.
Errors.uu-app-workspace/forbiddenAsidSysState: Application instance is not in active state and is probably under maintenance. Please try again later.
Errors.uu-dockit-main/document/load/documentDoe: The document does not exist. Please, check the property Document URL.
Errors.uu-dockit-main/document/load/userHasNotR: You have no access rights to the document. The lamp and switch are hidden.

UuLamp.Level01.LampCore.help: <uu5string/>The <UU5.Bricks.Code>UuLamp.Level01.Lamp</UU5.Bricks.Code> component is part of the uuLamp course. You can learn more in the <UU5.Bricks.Link href='https://uuapp.plus4u.net/uu-bookkit-maing01/f64b2a2561c240288e9d0912794a6272' content='uuLamp educational material' target='_blank'/>.

UuLamp.Level02.LampCore.help: <uu5string/>The <UU5.Bricks.Code>UuLamp.Level01.Lamp</UU5.Bricks.Code> component is part of the uuLamp course. You can learn more in the <UU5.Bricks.Link href='https://uuapp.plus4u.net/uu-bookkit-maing01/f64b2a2561c240288e9d0912794a6272' content='uuLamp educational material' target='_blank'/>.
UuLamp.Level02.LampCore.hiddenInfo: <uu5string/><UU5.Bricks.P>You are not authenticated and we don't know who you are! Thats why we hide lamp in the box and now you can't tell its state.</UU5.Bricks.P><UU5.Bricks.P>It can be off, it can be on or it can be both - wink - who can tell.</UU5.Bricks.P><UU5.Bricks.P>Maybe it's time for you to log-in and see for yourself!</UU5.Bricks.P>

UuLamp.Level03.LampCore.help: <uu5string/>The <UU5.Bricks.Code>UuLamp.Level01.Lamp</UU5.Bricks.Code> component is part of the uuLamp course. Thats why we hide lamp in the box and now you can't tell its state.</UU5.Bricks.P><UU5.Bricks.P>It can be off, it can be on or it can be both - wink - who can tell.</UU5.Bricks.P><UU5.Bricks.P>Maybe it's time for you to log-in and see for yourself!</UU5.Bricks.P>

UuLamp.Level04.LampCore.notAuthenticated: <uu5string/><UU5.Bricks.P>Nejste přihlášen(a) a nevíme kdo jste! Proto je obsah schován v krabici a vy nevíte jeho stav.</UU5.Bricks.P><UU5.Bricks.P>Asi je čas se přihlásit a zjistit to!</UU5.Bricks.P>

UuLamp.Level06.LampCore.noRoom: The Lamp component is not placed in room! Thats why we hide lamp in the box because we don't know state of light in the room. Maybe it's time to place Lamp into component Room.
